First Name is required

password is required
match the pattern
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'], }) export class RegisterComponent { model = { firstName: '', email: '', password: '', }; handleSubmit(form: NgForm) {} }
